name: Conjoined Twin Bean DEMO
description:
George from Microsoft has abducted you and your baby brother. You wake up to discover you and your brother are joined together. DUN DUN DUN!

You must escape the facility and find out who George, the discord moderator, is.

This game isn't meant to be taken seriously. its my first ever unity game. I'm working on a sci-fi horror game that will be at least 100x better than this. I will release a full version of this game soon!

Controls:

W A S D: Movement

Space: Jump

Escape: Quit Game

Credit to Innersloth for the Character Design and Footstep Sounds!

Credit to Infinihedron On Scratch for the Ambience!
